p: Vegetation with significantly larger safety margins relative to chance for both MAT and MAP ( i. e., z-score ≥1.96) occur across 11% of Australia (red locations in Fig. 3C). Conversely, vegetation with significantly smaller safety margins than expected for both climate variables ( i. e., z-score ≤ 1.96) are found across the majority (60%) of Australia (blue locations in Fig. 3C). In these regions, most locations have safety margins for reductions in MAP of <200 mm and for temperature change between 2–4 °C (Fig. 3D).
